summary: A red-gold recolor of my gilded ebony armor
descriptionHtml:
=======================================================================================================
+Notice!!
+I have released the mod for all the suggestions on the list
+Please refer to that mod instead of this one instead of this
+I will hide this file soon, so make sure to save the link of the new one if you want more ebony stuff!
+Link is: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7110
=======================================================================================================

This is done for a requested recolor of my gilded ebony set that I recently finished, should contain all ebony armor and weapons pieces besides the daedric reward for both male and female.


Other Ebony sets (i.e. the list):
Gilded: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1842
Electric&Dark Blue: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4957
Blue with white armor: (to be done)
-Red: done
-chrome or polished silver armor with the gold inlay: done
-Orange: done
-All the gems: done (I think)
-bronze color with dark blue designs: done
-White with gold: (to be done)

Feel free to make a request for a recoloring of your choice.

Please leave a comment after trying this out and endorse if you liked it!

Installation
-Drag and drop the textures folder into your data folder, located in your skyrim root folder
-Merge folders
(or use NMM)

Other mods:
Enhanced glass armor: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1985
Enhanced glass weapons: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2168

Legal:
-Don\'t upload any of my files anywhere without my permission.
-Don\'t change any of my files and claim them as your own without my permission.
-Respect that I have devoted a lot of time to this mod, do not steal my work.
author: Linkcube
